script.name: plugin.guilds.run
script.sourceplaintext:
$old.pid = get global variable: name='guilds.run' if $old.pid if is global script task running: pid=$old.pid if $a.restart kill global script: pid=$old.pid else return null end end end
$pid = get PID set global variable: name='guilds.run' value=$pid
$tSettings = get global variable: name='guilds.config' $tData = get global variable: name='guilds.data' $page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.guilds'
if not [PLAYERSHIP] -> exists @ = wait 2000 ms end
$last.player.sector = [PLAYERSHIP] -> get sector $last.seta = is SETA active
$guild.time = 2
while get global variable: name='guilds.run' * Check for new version of script and restart if is a new script version available @ START [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.run : Restarting?=[TRUE] return null end
@ = wait 1000 ms * check to resume SETA gosub sub.CheckSETA @ = wait 10 ms
if $guild.time <= 0 * process each guild gosub sub.DoBountyGuild @ = wait 10 ms gosub sub.DoAssassins @ = wait 10 ms gosub sub.DoNavigator @ = wait 10 ms gosub sub.DoMerchants @ = wait 10 ms gosub sub.DoMercs @ = wait 10 ms gosub sub.DoSmugglers @ = wait 10 ms $guild.time = 10 end dec $guild.time =
* process events gosub sub.DoEconEvents @ = wait 10 ms gosub sub.FillStocks @ = wait 10 ms $array = $tData['ware.buying'] gosub sub.ExpireTrades $array = $tData['ware.selling'] gosub sub.ExpireTrades @ = wait 10 ms
* check tracked bounties gosub sub.CheckTrackedBounties @ = wait 10 ms
@ START [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.docontested : @ = wait 10 ms end
* ========================== return null
* ========================== * ========================== sub.CheckSETA: if [PLAYERSHIP] -> exists if is SETA active $time = get player idle time if $time > 7200 activate SETA: [FALSE] end end
if $tSettings['seta.resume'] if [PLAYERSHIP] -> is task 0 in use $senseitivity = $tSettings['seta.sensitivity'] skip if $senseitivity $senseitivity = 2 $senseitivity = $senseitivity * 1000 $current.player.sector = [PLAYERSHIP] -> get sector if $last.player.sector != $current.player.sector if $seta.timer $current.timer = get game time ms $time = compare ms timer: start=$seta.timer, end=$current.timer $seta.timer = null do if $time > 0 AND $time < $senseitivity activate SETA: [TRUE] end end $is.seta = is SETA active if $last.seta AND $last.seta != $is.seta if $last.player.sector != $current.player.sector activate SETA: [TRUE] else $seta.timer = get game time ms end end $last.player.sector = $current.player.sector $last.seta = $is.seta endsub end end
$seta.timer = null $current.player.sector = [PLAYERSHIP] -> get sector end endsub
* ========================== * ========================== sub.CheckTrackedBounties: $bounty.array = create new array, arguments='bounty', 'assassin', null, null, null
$player.sector = [PLAYERSHIP] -> get sector
$table = $tData['tracked.bounty'] if $table $next.key = get next key: table=$table key=null while $next.key $key = $next.key $next.key = get next key: table=$table key=$next.key
$found = [FALSE]
$i = size of array $bounty.array while $i dec $i = $guild = $bounty.array[$i] $guild.table = $tData[$guild]['bounties'] if $guild.table if $guild.table[$key] $ship = $guild.table[$key]['ship'] if $ship -> exists $found = [TRUE] * do tracking of bounty $is.tracked = [FALSE] if [PLAYERSHIP] -> get amount of ware Bounty Tracking Computer in cargo bay $ship.sector = $ship -> get sector do if $ship.sector == $player.sector $is.tracked = [TRUE] end if $is.tracked $tracked.name = $ship -> get local variable: name='bounty.track' if not $tracked.name $ship.name = $ship -> get name $ship ->set local variable: name='bounty.track' value=$ship.name $text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1138, $ship.name, null, null, null, null $ship ->set name to $text end $tracked.last = $ship -> get local variable: name='bounty.track.last' $current.time = playing time if ! $tracked.last OR $current.time > ( $tracked.last + 240 ) $dist = get distance between [PLAYERSHIP] and $ship $scanner = [PLAYERSHIP] -> get scanner range if $scanner >= $dist play sample 924 START speak text: page=[Page.MiscVoice] id=1308 priority=60 $tracked.last = playing time $ship ->set local variable: name='bounty.track.last' value=$tracked.last end end else $tracked.name = $ship -> get local variable: name='bounty.track' if $tracked.name $ship ->set name to $tracked.name $ship ->set local variable: name='bounty.track' value=null end end break end end end end
if not $found remove key $key from table $table end end end endsub
* ========================== * ========================== sub.DoMercs: $guild = 'merc' gosub sub.CheckHQ gosub sub.CheckShipyard @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.createtrades : Guild=$guild Minimum=15 Maximum=30 Buying=[TRUE] @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.createtrades : Guild=$guild Minimum=15 Maximum=30 Buying=[FALSE] endsub
* ========================== * ========================== sub.DoMerchants: $guild = 'merchant' gosub sub.CheckHQ gosub sub.CheckShipyard @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.createtrades : Guild=$guild Minimum=40 Maximum=55 Buying=[TRUE] @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.createtrades : Guild=$guild Minimum=40 Maximum=55 Buying=[FALSE] @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.merchantnet : endsub
* ========================== * ========================== sub.DoSmugglers: $guild = 'smuggle' gosub sub.CheckHQ gosub sub.CheckShipyard endsub
* ========================== * ========================== sub.DoNavigator: $guild = 'taxi' gosub sub.CheckHQ gosub sub.CheckShipyard
$guild.table = $tData[$guild] @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.createpassenger : Guild Data=$guild.table endsub
* ========================== * ========================== sub.DoAssassins: $guild = 'assassin' gosub sub.CheckHQ gosub sub.CheckShipyard $bounty.type = 4 gosub sub.DoBounties endsub
* ========================== * ========================== sub.DoBountyGuild: $guild = 'bounty' gosub sub.CheckHQ gosub sub.CheckShipyard $bounty.type = null gosub sub.DoBounties endsub
sub.DoBounties: $guild.table = $tData[$guild] $tBounties = $guild.table['bounties'] if not $tBounties $tBounties = table alloc $guild.table['bounties'] = $tBounties end
* check and remove non existant bounties $key = get next key: table=$tBounties key=null while $key $ship = $key $key = get next key: table=$tBounties key=$key if not $ship -> exists remove key $ship from table $tBounties else if not $ship -> is script plugin.guilds.bounty.move on stack of task=0 $pilot = $ship ->get pilot speaker if $pilot -> exists if not $ship -> is of class Astronaut $table = $tBounties[$ship] @ START $ship -> call script plugin.guilds.bounty.move : Bounty Data=$table end end end end
* check if we should create a new bounty $count = size of table $tBounties $max = $tSettings['max.bounty'] if $count < $max $max = $tSettings['max.bounty.race'] @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.createbounty : Max=$max Guild Data=$guild.table Type=$bounty.type end endsub
* ========================== * check if the guild hq is still available * ========================== sub.CheckShipyard: $guild.table = $tData[$guild] $tHQ = $guild.table['shipyard'] $is.hq = [FALSE] gosub sub.CheckStation endsub
sub.CheckHQ: $guild.table = $tData[$guild] if $guild.table $tHQ = $guild.table['hq'] $is.hq = [TRUE] gosub sub.CheckStation end endsub
sub.CheckStation: if $tHQ $hq = $tHQ['obj'] if not $hq -> exists $destroyed = $tHQ['destroyed'] if $destroyed == -1 @ START [NULL] -> call script plugin.guilds.buildhq : Guild=$guild Data=$tHQ Is HQ?=$is.hq else $current.time = playing time $respawn = $tSettings['hq.respawn'] if $current.time > ( $destroyed + ( $respawn * 60 ) ) $hq.sector = $tHQ['sector'] $player.sector = [PLAYERSHIP] -> get sector if $hq.sector != $player.sector @ START [NULL] -> call script plugin.guilds.buildhq : Guild=$guild Data=$tHQ Is HQ?=$is.hq end end end end end endsub
* ========================== * ========================== sub.CheckEcon: $current.time = playing time $table = $tData[$var] $count = 0 if $table $key = get next key: table=$table key=null while $key $item = $key $key = get next key: table=$table key=$key
$value = $table[$item][3] if $current.time > $value $value = $table[$item][1] $item ->remove production modifier: ware=$value remove key $item from table $table end end $count = size of table $table end
$value = $tSettings[$var] if $value > $count if not $table $table = table alloc $tData[$var] = $table end $main.universe = get global variable: name='main.universe' skip if $main.universe -> exists $main.universe = get sector from universe index: x=0, y=0 skip if $main.universe -> exists $main.universe = [PLAYERSHIP] -> get sector
* find a sector $array = $main.universe -> find all sectors within 100 jumps: Only known sectors=[FALSE] if $array while size of array $array $size = size of array $array $rnd = random value from 0 to $size - 1 $sector = $array[$rnd] remove element from array $array at index $rnd
* only 1 product per sector do if $table[$sector] continue
* dont include enemy races $owner = $sector -> get owner race do if $owner == Xenon OR $owner == Kha'ak continue
* check for factories $tFacs = $sector ->get factory table from sector if $tFacs while size of table $tFacs $factory = get random key: table=$tFacs remove key $factory from table $tFacs if $factory -> exists $a = $factory -> get products if $a if size of array $a $ware = get random array item: array=$a end end skip if $ware $ware = $factory -> get product ware if $ware $current.time = playing time $rnd = random value from 21600 to 43200 - 1 $value = $current.time + $rnd $a = create new array, size=4, elements=$sector, $ware, $modifier, $value, null, null, null, null $table[$sector] = $a $sector ->add production modifier: ware=$ware, percent=$modifier, display=[TRUE] * add bbs article $bbs.articles = $tData['bbs.articles'] if $bbs.articles $bbs = table alloc $v = sprintf: fmt='%s.%s', $var, $sector, null, null, null $bbs.articles[$v] = $bbs $bbs['is.dynamic'] = [TRUE] $bbs['sector'] = $sector $bbs['range'] = 5 $bbs['max'] = 3 $bbs['expire'] = $value $maintype = get maintype of ware $ware if $maintype == [SSTYPE_W_ENERGY] $type = 0 else if $maintype == [SSTYPE_W_MINERALS] $type = 2 else if random value from 0 to 2 - 1 $type = 5 else $type = 7 end end $variables = table alloc $text = sprintf: fmt='%s', $ware, null, null, null, null $variables['$WARE$'] = $text if $modifier > 100 @ $text = [THIS] -> call script plugin.bbs.econnews : PageID=2200 Object=$sector Subtype=$type Variables=$variables else @ $text = [THIS] -> call script plugin.bbs.econnews : PageID=2201 Object=$sector Subtype=$type Variables=$variables end $bbs['text'] = $text @ $text = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.utils : type='getTitle' Value1=$text Value 2=null do if $text $bbs['tab'] = $text end endsub end end end end end
end end endsub
* ========================== * Process the economy events * ========================== sub.DoEconEvents: $var = 'econ.sector.neg' $modifier = 50 gosub sub.CheckEcon $var = 'econ.sector.pos' $modifier = 200 gosub sub.CheckEcon endsub
* ========================== * Fill up stocks * ========================== sub.FillStocks: $fill.amt = 10 $ware = Small Orbital Weapons Platform $array = get all shipyards with ship/station: $ware, only known=[FALSE] gosub sub.FillStockArray $ware = Medium Orbital Weapons Platform $array = get all shipyards with ship/station: $ware, only known=[FALSE] gosub sub.FillStockArray $ware = Large Orbital Weapons Platform $array = get all shipyards with ship/station: $ware, only known=[FALSE] gosub sub.FillStockArray endsub
sub.FillStockArray: if $array $i = size of array $array while $i dec $i = $station = $array[$i] if $station -> trades with ware $ware $free = $station -> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $amt = $station -> get amount of ware $ware in cargo bay if $amt < $fill.amt $amt = $fill.amt - $amt $amt = get maximum, $amt, $free, null, null, null = $station -> add $amt units of $ware end end end end endsub
sub.ExpireTrades: $current.time = playing time if $array $i = size of array $array while $i dec $i = $expire = $array[$i][3] if $current.time >= $expire $qty = $array[$i][1] $guild = $array[$i][4] $xp = $array[$i][5] $max = $array[$i][7] $percent = fixed multiply and divide: $qty * 100 / $max $percent = 100 - $percent $tmp = $xp $xp = linear interpolation: x1=0, x2=$xp, y1=0, y2=100, value=$percent @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.doexp : Exp=$xp Guild=$guild Delay=2000 remove element from array $array at index $i end end end endsub
* ========================== return null

line.text: is global script task running: pid=

comment.var: Check for new version of script and restart

line.text: is a new script version available

comment.var: check and remove non existant bounties
check if we should create a new bounty
check if the guild hq is still available

line.text: get sector from universe index: x=

sval.val: Check for new version of script and restart
check and remove non existant bounties
check if we should create a new bounty
check if the guild hq is still available
